source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot where the camera slowly pans upward.

The video opens on a residential street with parked cars and a low-rise apartment building, all seen through a canopy of lush green trees. As the camera tilts up, it reveals a sprawling city skyline in the distance, featuring numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a majestic mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky with scattered white clouds.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: Please combine the two paragraphs into one. The camera moves upward, not panning or tilting.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: Please merge the two paragraphs into a single cohesive one. Additionally, note that the camera movement is an upward motion, rather than a pan or tilt.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: Please merge the two paragraphs into a single cohesive one. Additionally, note that the camera movement is an upward motion, rather than a pan or tilt.

As the camera moves upward, it reveals a sprawling city skyline in the distance, showcasing numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a majestic mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky dotted with scattered white clouds.
